translated: Soiled with so many faults, Mary Magdalene came to the feet of our Redeemer, in tears; but flooded his soul within, if not the one, outside, kindness greeted? That caused his tears by the spirit of compunction, but he who, on the outside, so.
original: Souillée de tant et tant de fautes, Marie-Madeleine s’en vint aux pieds de notre Rédempteur, en larmes ; mais qui inonda son âme au-dedans, sinon celui dont, au-dehors, la bonté l’accueillait ? Qui provoquait ses pleurs par l’esprit de componction, sinon celui qui, à l’extérieur, so.
